resources.string: Press the button for a delicious joke!
-Want a premium experience from this app?\n-Switch to our paid app and enjoy premium jokes penned by Masters!!!\n-It is not a laughing matter but for $5, you could enjoy an entire year of laughs.
-You are now enjoying premium experience.\n-If you like this app, consider giving the app to your family and friends.\n-They will have a year full of laughs for just $5 and thank you for the gift.
